title: Waves - speed of wave midway down a hanging string

content.question: Which expression is equal to the speed of the wave at the midpoint of the string, a distance <math alttext="the fraction L over 2" overflow="scroll"> <mfrac> <mi>L</mi> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> </math> below the pulse generator?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of 7 g L, end root" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mrow><mn>7</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow></msqrt></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of seven halves g L, end root" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow></msqrt></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the square root of 3 g L, end root" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow></msqrt></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="2 times the square root of g L, end root" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi></msqrt></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of seven halves g L, end root" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mrow><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><mi>L</mi></mrow></msqrt></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 14.1: Properties of Wave Pulses and Waves

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
